name: a2x1_config_bits
title: A2x1 Config Bits
author: Inguss
description: Provides Several Quality of Life improvements. Configurables: Game Map Always day, Player inventory space, movement/walking/running speed and mining speed, Ability to Disable Player Hand Crafting speed for Lazy Bastard Achievement, Electricity pole range, Laboratory research speed, Furnace, mining-drill and assembling-machine Base Productivity and Crafting speed
